sentences.en: A version of the game for Mac computers will be released in February.
sentences.cn: 这个游戏的苹果电脑版将于2月份发行。

sentences.en: Action had been taken to speed up the release of cheques.
sentences.cn: 已经采取行动加速支票的发放。

sentences.en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentences.en: Britain is intensifying its efforts to secure the release of the hostages.
sentences.cn: 英国正加紧努力确保人质的获释。

sentences.en: He gave the okay to issue a new press release.
sentences.cn: 他同意发布一篇新的新闻稿。

sentences.en: He still had a lot of pent-up anger to release.
sentences.cn: 他还有很多强压的愤怒要发泄。

sentences.en: I personally don't want to release my anger on anyone else.
sentences.cn: 我个人并不想把自己的愤怒发泄在别人身上。

sentences.en: Ice could freeze up their torpedo release mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 冰可能会冻死他们的鱼雷发射装置。

sentences.en: Jesse Jackson was instrumental in the release of some of the hostages.
sentences.cn: 其中一些人质得以获释多亏了杰西·杰克逊。

sentences.en: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.cn: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.en: Private clampers demanded £17 to release her van.
sentences.cn: 私人夹车者要求支付17英镑才让她把货车开走。

sentences.en: Serious complications have delayed his release from hospital.
sentences.cn: 各种严重的并发症延迟了他的出院。

sentences.en: She felt the sudden sweet release of her own tears.
sentences.cn: 她感到自己甜蜜的泪水一下子涌了出来。

sentences.en: The autoexposure button is awkwardly placed under the lens release button.
sentences.cn: 自动曝光按钮安装在镜头脱卸按钮下面，十分不便。

sentences.en: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.cn: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.en: The hostage release could clear the decks for war.
sentences.cn: 人质的获释可能会为发动战争扫清障碍。

sentences.en: the movie will be on release from Christmas.
sentences.cn: 影片将从圣诞节起开始上映。

sentences.en: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.cn: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

sentences.en: The promotion of a big release can inflate a film'sfinal cost.
sentences.cn: 大规模发行所需的广告宣传会增加一部电影的最终成本。

sentences.en: The winners will get a chance to release their own single.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将有机会发行自己的单曲唱片。

sentences.en: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.cn: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

words.tran_cn: 释放；松释动作；脱扣释放

phrases.tran_cn: 脱产进修（英国和欧洲大陆提高企业人员水平的）
n. 通讯社或政府机构发布的新闻稿（等于press release）
发布日期；发行日期；出厂日期
释放机构；安全机构；分离机构；脱开机械装置

trans.tran_en: when someone is officially allowed to go free, after being kept somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 释放， 排放； 解除， 解脱； 放开， 松开； 发布， 发行
trans.tran_en: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 释放，松开，发泄，解雇，（使）放松，公布
trans.tran_en: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 排放； 发表； 解放， 释放
trans.tran_en: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 释放， 排放； 解除， 解脱； 放开， 松开； 发布； 发行
trans.tran_en: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere
to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere
